pages.title: Aluminum Ore
pages.text: $(l)Depth: y = 40 - 70$()$(br2)Aluminum ore veins can be found in the tertiary stratum in hot, flat biomes and tropical biomes that receive a lot of rain.$(br2)There are no known uses for aluminum beyond tools, though research is ongoing.

Hot flat biomes include:$(br)$(li)Desert$(li)Savanna$(li)Brushlands$(li)Outback$(li)Chapparal$(li)Lush Desert$(br2)Tropical biomes that receive a lot of rain include:$(br)$(li)Jungle$(li)Tropical Rain Forest
